headline.print_headline: U.S. to Increase Military Presence in Syria to Help Combat ISIS, Obama Says
headline.main: U.S. to Increase Military Presence in Syria, Obama Says

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: President Obama, whose comments came in a speech in which he pressed for European unity, said he would add 250 military personnel to the 50 already on the ground.
lead_paragraph: President Obama, whose comments came in a speech in which he pressed for European unity, said he would add 250 military personnel to the 50 already on the ground.
